rev.comment: renamed section simply to "activism": his activism is not only related to free software, and this section also talks about other topics
rev.diff:
Line 115: Line 115:
{{Bquote|There's something comforting about Stallman's intransigence. Win or lose, Stallman will never give up. He'll be the stubbornest mule on the farm until the day he dies. Call it fixity of purpose, or just plain cussedness, his single-minded commitment and brutal honesty are refreshing in a world of spin-meisters and multimillion-dollar marketing campaigns.|||Andrew Leonard|Salon.com}}
